mapper.insert:
select product_seq_product_no.nextval from dual
insert into PRODUCT(product_no,product_category_no,product_name,product_price,product_stock,product_grade,product_content,product_write_date) values(#{product_no},#{productCategoryNo},#{productName},#{productPrice},#{productStock},#{productGrade},#{productContent},#{productWriteDate})
